ddi:stdyInfo.ddi:abstract: Composition of household / social position of women in many respects general life-style / life career / effects of religion / feelings about information level on social and political affairs / alienation / adult education experiences and evaluation / participation in social and political activities / satisfaction with them, aspirations regarding them / attitude to changing role pattern for women / personal experiences of change and development of personality / satisfaction with a number of social relations and personal characteristics / structure of household duties / topics of discussion with partner / being in love / preferred way to be famous / being different from other women / actions for birth control / attitude to abortion / physical and mental complaints / neuroticism / anomy / evaluation of social relationships / anxieties / ideal personality assessed on the basis of eleven personality characteristics / work situation in outdoor job / political interest / opinions about media / different items compared with situation ten years ago. Background variables: basic characteristics/ residence/ household characteristics/ occupation/employment/ education/ social class/ politics/ religion/ readership, mass media, and 'cultural' exposure/ organizational membership
